attributes.action: allow that a petition be raised on this site to request that the BBC, when reporting the deaths of serving armed forces' personnel, carry such reports as lead stories as a mark of respect, ahead of tales of political and celebrity sleaze.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I suggest that it is inappropriate that those who die in action are sometimes treated by the BBC either as apparent afterthoughts or as somehow not very newsworthy in comparison to often sordid or transient stories, such as those about political sleaze or celebrities misbehaving. Our national broadcasting service should pay its respects, on behalf of its licence payers, by marking the ultimate sacrifice made by such men and women by leading with the reports of their tragic deaths.

rejection.details: Petitions to the Number 10 site should request an action that can be taken by the Prime Minister or Government. Editorial decisions made by BBC News are not under Government's control and your concerns should be addressed to the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
